BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: LUTHERAN SOCIAL SERVICES OF SOUTH DAKOTA

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PROVIDE SOCIAL SERVICES FOR PEOPLE OF ALL AGES, RACES, FAITHS, & ECONOMIC LEVELS IN SD.
IRS990.MissionDesc: INSPIRED BY GOD'S LOVE, WE CARE FOR, SUPPORT, AND STRENGTHEN INDIVIDUALS, FAMILIES AND COMMUNITIES.
IRS990.Desc: CHILDREN & YOUTH SERVICES - SERVICES PROVIDED FOR CHILDREN AND YOUTH INCLUDED RESIDENTIAL AND AFTER-CARE SERVICES FOR AT-RISK YOUTH, AND FOSTER CARE. 6,215 PEOPLE SERVED.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: COUNSELING AND COMMUNITY SERVICES - MENTAL HEALTH COUNSELING SERVICES WERE PROVIDED THROUGH INDIVIDUAL, COUPLES, FAMILY, AND GROUP COUNSELING SETTINGS, AS WELL AS IN RESPONSE TO DISASTERS. FINANCIAL RESOURCES SERVICES PROVIDED FINANCIAL COUNSELING, DEBT MANAGEMENT SERVICES, FINANCIAL EDUCATION, FORECLOSURE MITIGATION, HOUSING COUNSELING, AND BANKRUPTCY COUNSELING AND EDUCATION. OTHER SERVICES PROVIDED INCLUDED CHILDCARE SERVICES, MENTORING, AND ADOPTION. 18,559 PEOPLE SERVED.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: NEW AMERICAN PROGRAMS - REFUGEES AND IMMIGRANTS RECEIVED A VARIETY OF SERVICES TO HELP THEM MAKE A SUCCESSFUL TRANSITION TO A NEW CULTURE AND BECOME SELF-SUFFICIENT. 206 REFUGEES RESETTLED. 141 SECONDARY MIGRANTS ASSISTED. 1,240 IMMIGRATION COUNSELING HOURS. 749 EDUCATION STUDENTS. 21,580 INTERPRETER HOURS PROVIDED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: LSS STAFF TRAVEL TO PIERRE TO LOBBY LEGISLATORS ON BEHALF OF THE AGENCY IN REGARD TO LEGISLATION THAT AFFECTS THE AGENCY OR OUR CLIENTS.

CONSUMER CREDIT COUNSELING IS A SERVICE OFFERED BY LSS FOR THE PURPOSE OF PROVIDING FINANCIAL COUNSELING AND DEBT MANAGEMENT SERVICES. THESE FUNDS ARE HELD ON BEHALF OF CLIENTS FOR REMISSION TO THEIR CREDITORS. DISASTER SERVICES ARE PROVIDED BY LSS. IN SOME INSTANCES, THERE IS NOT A LOCAL ORGANIZATION ABLE TO HANDLE FUNDS THAT HAVE BEEN RAISED FOR DISASTER RESPONSE. FOR THE DELMONT TORNADO DISASTER RESPONSE, LSS IS HOLDING THOSE FUNDS TO BE DISBURSED ON BEHALF OF INDIVIDUALS AFFECTED BY THE DISASTER. THE FUND BALANCE IS $ 13,723 AT THE END OF 06/30/2018.
ENDOWMENT FUNDS ARE HELD BY LUTHERAN SOCIAL SERVICES OF SOUTH DAKOTA FOUNDATION. FUNDS DISTRIBUTED FROM THE ENDOWMENT ARE USED TO SUPPORT PROGRAMS OF LUTHERAN SOCIAL SERVICES.

LUTHERAN SOCIAL SERVICES OF SOUTH DAKOTA, INC. IS ORGANIZED AS A SOUTH DAKOTA NONPROFIT CORPORATION AND HAS BEEN RECOGNIZED BY THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE (IRS) AS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501(A) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE AS AN ORGANIZATION DESCRIBED IN SECTION 501(C)(3). THE ENTITY IS ANNUALLY REQUIRED TO FILE A RETURN OF ORGANIZATION EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAX (FORM 990) WITH THE IRS. IN ADDITION, THE ENTITY IS SUBJECT TO INCOME TAX ON NET INCOME THAT IS DERIVED FROM BUSINESS ACTIVITIES THAT ARE UNRELATED TO ITS EXEMPT PURPOSES. THE ENTITY HAS DETERMINED IT IS NOT SUBJECT TO UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME TAX AND HAS NOT FILED AN EXEMPT ORGANIZATION BUSINESS INCOME TAX RETURN (FORM 990-T) WITH THE IRS. THE ENTITY BELIEVES THAT IT HAS APPROPRIATE SUPPORT FOR ANY TAX POSITIONS TAKEN AFFECTING ITS ANNUAL FILING REQUIREMENTS, AND AS SUCH, DOES NOT HAVE ANY UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT ARE MATERIAL TO THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE ENTITY WOULD RECOGNIZE FUTURE ACCRUED INTEREST AND PENALTIES RELATED TO UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS AND LIABILITIES IN INCOME TAX EXPENSE IF SUCH INTEREST AND PENALTIES ARE INCURRED.

TaxExemptBondsIssuesGrp.PurposeDesc: CONSTRUCTION OF CENTER FOR CHILDREN AND YOUTH

OtherNonCashContriTableGrp.Desc: EVENT ITEMS, INCLUDING GIFT CERTIFICATES, EVENT TICKETS, AND PRIZES

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COLUMN B IS THE NUMBER OF ITEMS RECEIVED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 1
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION HAS AN EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE. THE COMMITTEE INCLUDES THE ELECTED OFFICERS OF THE BOARD AND AT LEAST TWO OTHER DIRECTORS. EACH MEMBER SHALL BE REPRESENTED ON THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE. THE COMMITTEE IS EMPOWERED TO ADMINISTER THE AFFAIRS OF THE CORPORATION BETWEEN MEETINGS, TO THE EXTENT AUTHORIZED BY THE BOARD. THE COMMITTEE SHALL EVALUATE THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AT LEAST ONCE EACH YEAR. MEETINGS OF THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE SHALL BE CALLED BY THE PRESIDENT OF THE BOARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE MEMBERS OF THE CORPORATION ARE THE COOPERATING LUTHERAN CHURCH JURISDICTIONAL UNITS WHICH PRESENTLY ARE THE SD SYNOD OF THE EVANGELICAL LUTHERAN CHURCH OF AMERICA.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SOUTH DAKOTA SYNOD OF THE EVANGELICAL LUTHERAN CHURCH ELECTS EIGHT DIRECTORS. OF THESE EIGHT DIRECTORS, THE BISHOP SHALL BE ONE DIRECTOR AND SEVEN DIRECTORS SHALL BE ELECTED FROM EACH OF THE SEVEN CONFERENCES, ONE FROM EACH CONFERENCE. DIRECTORS SHALL BE ELECTED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AT THE ANNUAL MEETINGS OF THE MEMBERS. REMAINING DIRECTORS SHALL BE ELECTED BY THE BOARD OF THE DIRECTORS OF LSSSD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MEMBERS OF THE ORGANIZATION ADOPT AMENDMENTS TO THE ARTICLES OF INCORPORATION AND BYLAWS AND APPROVE NEW MEMBERS OF THE CORPORATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A COPY OF THE FORM 990 IS PROVIDED TO THE GOVERNING BODY ELECTRONICALLY AT LEAST ONE WEEK PRIOR TO FILING AND IS REVIEWED IN DETAIL BY THE TOP FINANCIAL OFFICIALS OF LUTHERAN SOCIAL SERVICES OF SD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EACH BOARD MEETING BEGINS WITH THE PRESENTATION OF AN AGENDA AND UPON REVIEW OF THIS AGENDA THE MEMBERS ARE ASKED TO DISCLOSE ANY CONFLICTS OF INTEREST. ALSO, OFFICERS, DIRECTORS AND TRUSTEES COMPLETE A CONFLICT OF INTEREST ANNUAL DISCLOSURE. MONITORING AND COMPLIANCE IS DONE BY HAVING THE EXECUTIVE ASSISTANT TRACK RECEIPT OF THE FORMS THAT ARE COMPLETED AND FOLLOW-UP WITH ANY BOARD MEMBER(S) THAT HAS NOT SUBMITTED A FORM. THE FORMS ARE REVIEWED BY THE PRESIDENT AND ANY QUESTIONABLE DISCLOSURES ARE REFERRED TO THE BOARD CHAIR FOR FINAL DETERMINATION. IF A CONFLICT IS IDENTIFIED THE MEMBER WOULD ABSTAIN FROM VOTING, BUT POLICY DOES ALLOW THEM TO STATE THEIR POSITION AND ANSWER PERTINENT QUESTIONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PRESIDENT'S COMPENSATION IS DETERMINED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS BASED ON COMPARABLE COMPENSATION LEVELS OF OTHER LSS ENTITIES AND SIMILAR NONPROFIT AGENCIES IN THE GEOGRAPHIC AREA. THE COMPENSATION LEVEL IS REVIEWED AND APPROVED ANNUALLY. THE VICE PRESIDENT'S COMPENSATION IS DETERMINED BY THE PRESIDENT BASED ON PERFORMANCE, COST OF LIVING, AVAILABILITY OF BUDGETED FUNDS, ETC. IT IS REVIEWED ANNUALLY USING THE SALARY COMPENSATION POLICY OF THE ORGANIZATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
